udgathawa thibena mema thaththwaya sambandhayen apata athi athitha athdakimda etharam mihiri nowe.eksath jathinge kalaguna wiparyasayan pilimbaada pa්ragnyapthiyata 1997 wasaredi hadunwadun kiyotho sammuthiyatada paris ekagathawayata ha samana piliganimak himiwiya.namuth edawasa lowa anka eke harithagara wayu wimochakaya lesa salakunu eksath janapadaya,kiyotho sammuthiyedi pawathwunu sakachcha walata saki්rayawa sahabhagi wuwada awasanaye wayu wimochanayan sima kirimata ekaga nowuni.kiyotho sammuthiye kotaskaruwaku wime adahasak nathiwa sema eyata dadiwa wirodhaya dakwana bawada woshintan paripalanaya kiya sitiyeya.

thamantath nawa-libaralwadayatath erehiwa pana naengana janatha wirodhaya maga harawanna sinhala janathawa idiriye wyaja thamil hathurek nirmanaya kirime upaka්ramaya pilibandawa rajapaksha igena gaththeth je.aar.gen. eda ee apakirthimath kalu juliya dadamima karagena wamanshika wyaparaya kudupattam kirimata piyawara gaththa. 1970 dashakaye sitama sannaddha swarupayakata maru wemin thibunu jathika pa්rashnaya 1983 kalu juliyen passe wenath thalayakata ada damuna.

pasugiya athithaye merata natya pa්rabodhayen shakthimath wuneth kala rasagnyathawa mul kota lath janathawage siwil balayayi.
athithaye eeshrayelaye nithiya thahanam kara thibuna ekthara naya thathwayanta wisheshayen dugi ayaෙgan poli ganima (lewi kathawa 25:35-38).
meka nam ithamath wadagath karanawak.
bududahama saha wargikagamika(boru) bauddhakama yanu ekinekata paraspara prapancha dekak bawa apa digin digatama mathu karana adahasaki.
sampandan wana athara wipakshaye pradhana sanwidhayaka lesa sitinne janatha wimukthi peramune nayaka anura kumara disanayaka ya.
